column4: hi! im using ubuntu 5.10 and want to upgrade to latest verison of firefox.. if i install the .tar.gz from firefox site i wont be managed by ubuntus debian based dpkg system?
is there a way to update firefox via the dpkg system?
not in breezy.  Dapper has firefox1.5 (just wait 3 weeks for final release)
ubuntu releases security updates (firefox 1.08 was reelased recently)
